Name: Museums_Rank
Info: Number, type, and quality of museums

Name: Sports_Rank
Info: Ranked by a variety of factors related to sporting events and professional franchises

Name: Rent_Income_Ratio_Rank
Info: A ratio of annual income to monthly rate

Name: Pet Friendly_Rank
Info: Landlord tolerance, pet fees, and concentration of pet services and stores

Name: LGBTQ_Friendly_Rank
Info: A measure 16 different factors related to LGBTQ lifestyle

Name: Food_Rank
Info: Ranking based on the cities' finest restaurants, signature dishes, traditional cuisine, and strength of the dining culture

Name: Music_Rank
Info: Reader input ranking of best/favorite music scenes in the US

Name: Safety_Rank
Info: Violent crime, workplace fatality rates, traffic death rates, and natural disaster risk

Name: Shopping_Rank
Info: Number of retail locations, shopping centers, and sales tax

Name: Fitness_Rank
Info: A set of 24 metrics from budget and local participation to number of sports facilities and quality of outdoor environment

Name: Transit_Rank
Info: "Usefulness" of transit routes based on frequency, type of route, and distance to nearest stop on the route

Name: Bike_Rank
Info: Ranked based on bike infrastructure, hills, road connectivity, and number of bike commuters

Name: Walk_Rank
Info: Ranked by pedestrian friendliness and distance to amenities
